# does the south experience more gun violence?
gs %>% 
    group_by(state,year) %>% 
    summarise(dead_state=sum(dead)) %>%
    left_join(states,by=c(\state\"=\"State\")) %>%  # left join with states data frame to associate states with regions

column1: ylab(\"persons killed by gun violence (in thousands)\") + xlab(\"\") +
